SELECT count(CASE WHEN atd_state = '정상출근' THEN 1 END) AS 정상출근, count(CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(atd_in_time, 'HH24') >= 9 AND atd_state is null THEN 1 END) AS 지각, count(CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(atd_out_time, 'HH24') < 18 AND atd_out_time is not null THEN 1 END) AS 조퇴, count(CASE WHEN atd_state = '결근' THEN 1 END) AS 결근, count(CASE WHEN atd_overtime_yn = 'Y' THEN 1 END) AS 추가근무 FROM attendances WHERE emp_id = #{empId} AND atd_in_time BETWEEN TRUNC(to_date(#{chartDate}, 'YYYY/MM'), 'MM') AND TRUNC(LAST_DAY(to_date(#{chartDate}, 'YYYY/MM'))) + INTERVAL '1' DAY - INTERVAL '1' SECOND

mapper.update: MERGE INTO attendances USING ( SELECT DISTINCT TRUNC(to_date(to_char(#{levAppStartDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD')) + LEVEL - 1) as atd_date, #{levAppCategory} as atd_state FROM dual CONNECT BY LEVEL <= TRUNC(to_date(to_char(#{levAppEndDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD'))) - TRUNC(to_date(to_char(#{levAppStartDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD'))) + 1 ) new_attendance ON (TRUNC(Attendances.atd_in_time) = new_attendance.atd_date AND Attendances.emp_id = #{empId}) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET Attendances.atd_state = new_attendance.atd_state, Attendances.atd_out_time = CASE WHEN new_attendance.atd_state = '오후반차' THEN to_date(to_char(new_attendance.atd_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') || ' 23:00:00', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') ELSE Attendances.atd_out_time END WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT (atd_id, emp_id, atd_in_time, atd_out_time, atd_state) VALUES ( seq_atd_id.nextval, #{empId}, CASE WHEN new_attendance.atd_state = '대체휴무' OR new_attendance.atd_state = '연차' THEN to_date(to_char(new_attendance.atd_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') || ' 08:59:59', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') WHEN new_attendance.atd_state = '오전반차' THEN to_date(to_char(new_attendance.atd_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') || ' 14:00:00', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') ELSE NULL END, CASE WHEN new_attendance.atd_state = '오후반차' THEN to_date(to_char(new_attendance.atd_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') || ' 23:00:00', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') ELSE NULL END, new_attendance.atd_state )
mapper.select: SELECT atd_in_time, atd_out_time FROM attendances WHERE emp_id = #{empId} AND to_char(atd_in_time, 'YYYY-MM-DD') = to_char(#{levAppStartDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
mapper.update: UPDATE attendances SET atd_state = null , atd_in_time = null , atd_out_time = null WHERE emp_id = #{empId} AND to_char(atd_in_time, 'yyyy-MM-DD') = to_char(#{levAppStartDate}, 'yyyy-MM-DD')
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM attendances WHERE (#{levAppCategory} IN ('연차', '오전반차', '대체휴무') AND to_char(atd_in_time, 'YYYY-MM-DD') BETWEEN to_char(#{levAppStartDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND to_char(#{levAppEndDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD')) OR (#{levAppCategory} = '오후반차' AND to_char(atd_out_time, 'YYYY-MM-DD') BETWEEN to_char(#{levAppStartDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND to_char(#{levAppEndDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD'))
